articles.title: FPIs turn buyers; invest Rs 1,433 crore in equities till mid-November - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Indian debt yields are comparatively higher than the US debt yields, making them more attractive to FPIs.  With this, the total investment by FPIs in equity has reached Rs 97,405 crore and over Rs 47,800 crore in the debt market this year so far
